oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Paralela corpus and search engine
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pęzik, Piotr
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: parallel corpus
corpus search engine
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Paralela is as an open-ended, opportunistic parallel corpus of Polish-English and English-Polish translations. It currently contains 262 million words in 10,877,000 translation segments. The Paralela online search engine supports the SlopeQ query syntax for bilingual Polish-English corpus queries for the full dataset. Both the full texts and query results can be accessed and exported through the online application at http://paralela.clarin-pl.eu.
